DOC.brief_summary: The aim study present novel Intramedullary Nail ( IMN ) make CFR - PEED composite , biomechanically tailor closely match cortical bone . This IMN promote fracture heal prevent stress shield osteopenia . Case record patient humurus shaft fracture retrospectively review determine whether implant promotes bone healing .
DOC.brief_title: `` Bio-logical '' Carbon Fiber Intramedullary Nail Biomechanical Test Preliminary Clinical Results
